import { useState, useEffect } from "react" import { useParams } from "react-router-dom"; export default function SingleProductPage() { const [product, setProduct] = useState(null); const { _id } = useParams(); useEffect(() => { fetch(`${process.env.REACT_APP_BASE_URL}/products/${id}`) .then(res => res.json()) .then(res => setProduct(res.product)) .catch(error => console.error('Error fetching product:', error)); }, [id]); if (!product) { return
Loading...
; } return (
